member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateHttp(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a listener to receive incoming HTTP requests on IPAddress.Any and the given port. The resulting HTTP prefix will be similar to http://{address}:{port}/announce/ and will support Scrape requests.
member.param: The local port to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateHttp(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a listener to receive incoming HTTP requests on the given local IP address and port. The resulting HTTP prefix will be similar to http://{address}:{port}/announce/ and will support Scrape requests.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The local port to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateHttp(System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Creates a listener to receive incoming HTTP requests on the given local endpoint. The resulting HTTP prefix will be similar to http://{address}:{port}/announce/ and will support Scrape requests.
member.param: The local endpoint to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateHttp(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a listener to receive incoming HTTP requests on the given HTTP prefix. If the prefix ends in '/announce/' it will support Scrape requests, otherwise scraping will be disabled. The prefix should be in the form http://{address}:{port}/test/query/announce/
member.param: The HTTP prefix to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateUdp(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a listener which binds to IPAddress.Any and listens for incoming UDP requests on the given local port.
member.param: The local port to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateUdp(System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a listener which listens for incoming UDP requests on the given local IP address and port.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The local port to bind to.

member.name: M:MonoTorrent.Connections.TrackerServer.TrackerListenerFactory.CreateUdp(System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Creates a listener which listens for incoming UDP requests on the given local IP address and port.
member.param: The local endpoint to bind to.

member.name: P:MonoTorrent.GitInfoHelper.ClientVersion
member.summary: The current version of the client in the form "MO1234", which represents a version triplet of '1.2.34'.

member.name: F:MonoTorrent.GitInfoHelper.Version
member.summary: The full version of this library in the form 'A.B.C'. 'A' and 'B' are guaranteed to be 1 digit each. 'C' can be one or two digits.
